p: In Polish habitat salvia collection is carried out twice a year. The harvest was performed manually, using secateurs, with the beginning of plants’ flowering, about 10 cm above the soil surface. Then the plants were randomized and dried in natural conditions in a shaded room or in a laboratory dryer with forced convection at 35 °C. The volume of the dryer working chamber was 100 dm 3. Drying time, to the desired humidity, at 35 °C lasted 4 days, while in natural conditions 2 weeks.
